reference.title: cxxStruct module
reference.shortdesc: Defines a top-level container for all the elements necessary to describe an C++ API struct.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxStruct> topic type contains elements necessary to show the name of the struct, the short description of the struct, the struct syntax, and the struct use description. This topic type module also contains all the elements necessary to describe the component variables and functions.
To describe the component fields and methods insert cxxFunction, cxxDefine, cxxVariable, cxxEnumeration or cxxTypedef elements into the cxxStruct module.
The cxxStruct topic contains the following elements:
